Research

  1. Software defined and cognitive networks
  2. Distributed learning and processing for efficient data acquisition, transportation and analysis
  3. Autonomous Systems - Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
  4. (Urban) IoT architectures and signal processing for mobile health care
  5. Modeling and control of Smart Energy Systems
